short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live Assistant | Record, Transcribe & Summarize Google Meet, Zoom & Teams meetings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to implement into your workflow, Noota is the best AI assistant to generate detailed and custom meeting reports.

Compatible with all your favorite platforms : Google Meets, Zoom, Microsoft Teams. Available in +80 languages 🌐 🌍 🇫🇷 🇺🇸 🇬🇧 🇩🇪 🇪🇸

🎞️ Screen Recorder 
• Easily record, store and export your calls and meeting with Noota’s built-in screen recorder.

✍️ Automatic note taking 
• Noota saves your valuable time by atomizing note taking and delivering a highly precise transcription and notes that you can also edit, export and share to your colleagues.

📝 AI reports
•Generate customized meeting reports tailored to your needs, ranging from bullet points to highly detailed reports with Noota.

👥 CRM and ATS integration 
• Automate data management with Noota’s integrations into your favorites CRM & ATS platforms.

🛣 Guidelines 
• Align your teams on the best practices 
• Easily set and follow the best script for your meetings 
• Get an AI-generated sum-up for every question at the end of you call

📊 Analysis 
• Sentiment ratio, talk-to-listen ratio, number of hesitations, subject detector and many more KPIs for you to truly understand your customers

Thousands of sales, HR and other professionals use Noota to increase performance and save 60 min daily with CRM and ATS automation.

Your security and privacy is extremely important to us:
